snippet.title: Neon Echo |  Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
3D Side-scrolling + Action Roguelite + Electronic Music! Check out this real-time in-game demonstration promo video of Neon Echo!
Neon Echo is our team's first 3D-Roguelite side-scrolling action game with a trendy anime style. 
What will happen when traditional roguelite elements are combined with excellent features of other genres? As a group of roguelite lovers, we are very curious to know the answer!
